SubCommandAddLiveUser.Name: add
SubCommandAddLiveUser.Description: Add a user to the NowLive channel

CommandParametersAddLiveUser.Name: username
CommandParametersAddLiveUser.Description: Username of the user that you want to add

SubCommandRemoveLiveUser.Name: remove
SubCommandRemoveLiveUser.Description: Remove a user from the NowLive channel

CommandParametersRemoveLiveUser.Name: username
CommandParametersRemoveLiveUser.Description: Username of the user that you want to remove
